projects.title: Password Generator
projects.subtitle: web app to generate random passwords.
projects.description: Fullstack web application for password generation and management. I developed the backend using Python and Django, implementing the password generation logic and an API to communicate with the frontend. I also implemented JWT-based authentication, allowing users to register, log in, and manage their passwords (create, edit, and delete), as well as manage their user account. The project is deployed and fully functional in production.
